医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
鉴定抗病毒蛋白 IFN-γ 作为长新冠肺炎的潜在生物标志物SARS-CoV-2 会触发抗病毒蛋白 IFN-γ 的产生，这种蛋白与疲劳、肌肉疼痛和抑郁有关。新的研究表明，在长期感染的新冠患者中，IFN-y 的产生持续存在，直到症状改善，这凸显了潜在的生物标志物和治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Identifying-antiviral- Protein-IFN-ceb3-as-a-potential-biomarker-for-Long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Identifying-antiviral- Protein-IFN-ceb3-as-a-potential-biomarker-for-Long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e106e751-33f6-4c43-979b-f6bf303​​0b288 Sat, 24 Feb 2024 04:09:00 -0500 Identifying antiviral protein IFN-γ as a potential biomarker for Long COVID
新政府报告强调英国隐藏的糖尿病流行​​​​​​​一份新的政府报告显示，100 万英国成年人可能患有未确诊的糖尿病，其中至少 510 万人处于糖尿病前期。他们中的许多人都很年轻，体重适中，而且完全没有症状。一位权威专家表示，这就是为什么进行简单的血液检查至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/New-Government-report-highlights-hidden-diabetes-epidemic-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/New-Government-report-highlights-hidden-diabetes-epidemic-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bb8b50a-9abe-44f5-a7bd-6415c0cb856f Sat, 24 Feb 2024 04:05:00 -0500 New Government report highlights hidden diabetes epidemic in the UK
上议院委员会开始征集有关早产预防和后果的证据上议院早产委员会已发布呼吁提供证据，作为其调查早产预防及其后果的调查的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/House-of-Lords-committee-opens-call-for-evidence-on-prevention-and-consequences-of-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/House-of-Lords-committee-opens-call-for-evidence-on-prevention-and-consequences-of-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f5c9119-3ef1-4acf-87f1-1aa76cccc87d Sat, 24 Feb 2024 04:03:00 -0500 House of Lords committee opens call for evidence on prevention and consequences of preterm birth
使用深部脑刺激来绘制与四种疾病相关的功能失调的大脑回路麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究人员发现，由于帕金森病、肌张力障碍、强迫症和图雷特综合症，一些连接被破坏和出现故障。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Using-deep-brain-stimulation-to-map-dysfunction-brain- Circuits-linked-to-four-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Using-deep-brain-stimulation-to-map-dysfunction-brain- Circuits-linked-to-four-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a5a69cf-020d-48ad-90b9-97a575441c75 Sat, 24 Feb 2024 04:00:00 -0500 Using deep brain stimulation to map dysfunctional brain circuits linked to four disorders
探索类风湿性关节炎和心房颤动之间的联系宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。观察性研究表明，被诊断患有类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 的个体发生心房颤动 (AF) 的可能性较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Exploring-the-link- Between-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Exploring-the-link- Between-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0f0e4f9-c7f7-4e49-899e-8783c446c9e3 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 23:24:56 -0500 Exploring the link between rheumatoid arthritis and atrial fibrillation
重新评估直接口服抗凝药在心血管治疗中的作用直接口服抗凝剂（DOAC）是多种心血管疾病患者的常见治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Reevaluating-the-role-of-direct-oral-anticoaguants-in-cardioangio-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Reevaluating-the-role-of-direct-oral-anticoaguants-in-cardioangio-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0d335bf-4e33-480d-bc72-7de672974480 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 23:16:32 -0500 Reevaluating the role of direct oral anticoagulants in cardiovascular treatment
揭示维生素 B6 在胰腺癌和免疫系统战斗中的作用维生素 B6 在很多方面都有益处，特别是它在维持强大的免疫系统方面的作用。然而，当胰腺癌发生时，其细胞也需要维生素 B6 才能复制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Unlocking-vitamin-B6s-role-in-pancreatic-cancer-and-immune-system-battle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Unlocking-vitamin-B6s-role-in-pancreatic-cancer-and-immune-system-battle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb41a4dc-a444-4e7b-ab93-deeda3b1088e Fri, 23 Feb 2024 23:05:44 -0500 Unlocking vitamin B6's role in pancreatic cancer and immune system battle
研究揭示了拟南芥核基质的组成染色质是构成染色体的独特 DNA 和蛋白质复合物。特定的蛋白质（组蛋白）像小电缆鼓一样缠绕 DNA，以包装长 DNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Study-sheds-light-on-the-composition-of-nuclear-matrix-in-Arabidopsis-thaliana.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Study-sheds-light-on-the-composition-of-nuclear-matrix-in-Arabidopsis-thaliana.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc6ff1d3-ccec-4718-908f-a8af0346b58d Fri, 23 Feb 2024 22:32:55 -0500 Study sheds light on the composition of nuclear matrix in Arabidopsis thaliana
新疫苗 SKYTyphoid 获得世界卫生组织资格预审，促进全球健康SK bioscience和国际疫苗研究所（IVI）今天宣布，SK bioscience通过IVI技术转让开发的伤寒结合疫苗已获得世界卫生组织资格预审（PQ），这为联合国组织公共采购疫苗铺平了道路并提振全球 TCV 供应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Global-health-boost-as-new-vaccine-SKYTyphoid-gains-WHO-prequalification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Global-health-boost-as-new-vaccine-SKYTyphoid-gains-WHO-prequalification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26db1910-d71c-47b7-861b-fe9faf0aa99f Fri, 23 Feb 2024 22:22:43 -0500 Global health boost as new vaccine SKYTyphoid gains WHO prequalification
解码蝙蝠如何区分声音以进行导航和交流塞巴短尾蝙蝠（Carollia perspicillata）生活在中美洲和南美洲的亚热带和热带森林中，主要以胡椒果为食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Decoding-how-bats-distinguish-sounds-for-navigation-and-communication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240223/Decoding-how-bats-distinguish-sounds-for-navigation-and-communication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d879eb86-3704-4a9c-88ec-3f080545d0a6 Fri, 23 Feb 2024 22:10:10 -0500 Decoding how bats distinguish sounds for navigation and communication
